_sText:
From wilderness to early morning town.



A map that I had been working on and off for the past 2 years.

For an average first time player it should take around 20-30 minutes with auto (30-40 mins scroll) to beat the map. Once you've beaten the map once, it should take around 10 minutes.
The map has a longjump room, a bonus and a secret.

Start and end zones are marked. HDR+Bloom recommended.

Bad framerate?

Enable multicore rendering (mat_queue_mode -1). This will improve rendering times, specifically static prop rendering. I did what I could to optimize the map and had to halt adding more detail because of this reason.

EDITS

25 Dec 2016 - Update 1 (u1) (Slight changes to make it easier)
